content:
# I have successfully extracted another stone brick, bringing my total to 8 stone bricks in inventory. 
# The furnace is still operational, with 4 units of coal remaining, but it currently has no ingredients to smelt.

# To continue production, I should gather more stone. I will head to the nearest stone patch and collect more resources.

stone_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)  # Locate the nearest stone resource
move_to(stone_position)  # Move to the stone resource position
harvest_resource(stone_position, quantity=10)  # Collect more stone
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after harvesting stone.
